Name: Nocturnal

Actions.Name: The Horror
Actions.Effects: May teleport up to 3 spaces before or after the attack.

Actions.Name: Rake
Actions.AreaEffect: Foes in the area take [fray] damage. The Nocturnal may teleport to any space in the area after this action resolves.

Actions.Name: Disappear
Actions.Description: Remove the Nocturnal from the battlefield and place them in any free space.

PhasesDescription: Phase change triggers at the start of each round. The Nocturnal starts in phase II and can shift up or down one phase (so it can't shift from I to III for example). It must shift phases.

Actions.Name: Paranoia
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 is marked. While marked, they cannot target allies with abilities and effects. A character can save at the end of their turn to clear this mark, ending it on a success.

Actions.Name: Amygdala
Actions.Description: All foes in range 3 are forced to flee. They must save or be shoved 2 spaces in a direction of the Nocturnal's choice. At the start of their next turn, even if they saved successfully, the Nocturnal can shove them 2 in a direction of its choice.

Actions.Name: Great Fell Shot
Actions.Description: Mark two unoccupied spaces in range 8.
Actions.Effects: Characters that enter that space or start their turn there are struck by a projectile, taking 3 damage twice, and ending this effect. This area lasts until triggered.

Actions.Name: Embrace
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe must save. On a successful save, they are shoved 1 and take [D]+fray. On a failed save, they take divine damage equal to 50% of their max hp. Either way, this attack can't take them below 1 hp.

Actions.Name: Open Wound
Actions.Description: A foe in range 4 is marked. While marked, when that foe is shoved, they take [fray] damage. A foe can save against this effect at the end of their turn, ending the mark.
